sentences.sContent: The ten young people sleep between two hard, narrow beds and one large mattress on the floor with no privacy at all.
sentences.sContent_eng: The ten young people sleep between two hard, narrow beds and one large mattress on the floor with no privacy at all.
sentences.sCn: 十个年轻人就睡在两张窄小的硬板床和地板上的一张大床垫上，没有任何隐私可言。

sentences.sContent: If someone pokes fun at your mattress on the floor, or teases you about your empty cabinets, smile and take it in stride.
sentences.sContent_eng: If someone pokes fun at your mattress on the floor, or teases you about your empty cabinets, smile and take it in stride.
sentences.sCn: 如果有人取笑你放在地板上的床垫，或揶揄你空空的橱柜，请面带微笑从容应对此事。

sentences.sContent: She laid a spring mattress under the sheet.
sentences.sContent_eng: She laid a spring mattress under the sheet.
sentences.sCn: 她在床单下面铺了一个弹簧床垫。

trans.tranOther: the soft part of a bed that you lie on
